dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, um, the pandemic, right? It totally, like, supercharged remote work for so many of us.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, um, the pandemic, right? It totally, like, supercharged remote work for so many of us.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for sure. And now with vaccines rolling out, people are thinking, "Hey, if I can work from home, why can't I work from… anywhere?"
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for sure. And now with vaccines rolling out, people are thinking, Hey, if I can work from home, why can't I work from... anywhere?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! It's like the perfect storm for digital nomadism. Countries are even introducing, you know, these working holiday visas to boost their tourism.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! It's like the perfect storm for digital nomadism. Countries are even introducing, you know, these working holiday visas to boost their tourism.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In response to the increased need to work from home many countries have introduced working holiday visas to encourage a new form of tourism to boost their badly affected coffers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which is smart! I mean, if you've been effective remotely for months, why not do it from a mountain retreat or, like, a beach somewhere?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is smart! I mean, if you've been effective remotely for months, why not do it from a mountain retreat or, like, a beach somewhere?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But then the big question is: *where*? And luckily, someone's done the legwork. Circle Loop, I guess, put together this Digital Nomad Index.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then the big question is: where? And luckily, someone's done the legwork. Circle Loop, I guess, put together this Digital Nomad Index.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With that in mind Circle Loop has done the legwork for you, taking in a range of factors from the price and speed of net connections to rental prices and remote job searches. It even takes in country rankings on the Global Happiness Index. Its results have informed its Digital Nomad Index ranking the top ten countries in which to be a digital nomad.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I saw that! And, um, drumroll please, Canada took the top spot!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I saw that! And, um, drumroll please, Canada took the top spot!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Taking the top spot is Canada.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Canada makes a lot of sense. One of the biggest tech hubs, really fast internet, a top-ten happiness ranking, and just tons of remote job returns.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Canada makes a lot of sense. One of the biggest tech hubs, really fast internet, a top-ten happiness ranking, and just tons of remote job returns.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Home to one of the largest tech hubs in the world it scores well across the board, from fast internet speeds to a top ten ranking on the Global Happiness Index and by far the most remote job search returns in the top ten.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] But get this, the UK came in second! I mean, with all the Brexit stuff, that was pretty surprising to me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But get this, the U K came in second! I mean, with all the Brexit stuff, that was pretty surprising to me.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Somewhat surprisingly considering the current turmoil of Brexit, the UK is the runner up thanks to the volume of remote jobs available coupled with a high standard of living.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that *is* a bit of a shocker. What about the third spot? Because I heard it's, uh, not what most people would expect.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that is a bit of a shocker. What about the third spot? Because I heard it's, uh, not what most people would expect.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Romania! Can you believe it? It's a rapidly growing IT market, and get this: super-fast broadband packages for, like, eight bucks a month. Eight dollars!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Romania! Can you believe it? It's a rapidly growing I T market, and get this: super-fast broadband packages for, like, eight dollars a month. Eight dollars!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Third place goes to Romania a country Id wager isnt on most peoples digital nomad radar. But as one of the fastest growing information technology markets in Central and Eastern Europe, its a great marriage of opportunity and fantastically low living costs super fast fixed line broadband packages cost around $8 a month!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's wild. So, you can live really well for not much. And I noticed, uh, a lot of European countries dominated the list, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's wild. So, you can live really well for not much. And I noticed, uh, a lot of European countries dominated the list, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Digital Nomad Index top ten features eight European countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Aside from Canada and Australia in ninth, it's pretty much a European sweep in the top ten.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Aside from Canada and Australia in ninth, it's pretty much a European sweep in the top ten.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It tops a strong run of European countries dominating the index aside from Canada, the only other non European country in the top ten is Australia in ninth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, if you're thinking of, you know, embracing that digital nomad life and combining work with travel…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, if you're thinking of, you know, embracing that digital nomad life and combining work with travel...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: There are some seriously compelling options out there!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: There are some seriously compelling options out there!
